forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds with a gentle and intriguing allure. A curtain of partly sunny skies casts a modest light across the city, where temperatures hover around a pleasant yet cool 60 degrees. As the afternoon approaches, expect a subtle retreat of warmth, settling back toward 58. The west southwest breeze, dancing between 8 and 14 miles per hour, carries with it the occasional gust, playfully tugging at the edges of your clothing.

Tonight invites a shift towards greater cloud cover, with temperatures lightly cradling the night at around 53. The winds will soften, yet still rustle with a charm as they blow at 7 to 13 miles per hour. As you navigate the streets, you might notice a hint of fog beginning to settle, creating a soft veil over the iconic architecture; it adds an air of mystery while gently rolling over the hills. Dressing in layers is advisable—think a light jacket or sweater that can be easily shed as the sun finds its way through the clouds. This weather calls for meandering strolls along the Embarcadero or popping into a cozy café to savor a warm drink while the day unfolds.
